divs: Sighting Detailsobject or objects moved in straight line about the same speed as a plane would appear to fly from high altitude. Seemed to be high up also looked as though they were 3 seperate circles and solid but moved with each other leaving me to believe they were connected or one single triangle shaped craft. Grabed phone took picture tried for more pics but couldnt get another one in time. Camera phone is not very detailed was hoping to get photo and zoom in later to see closer.
Summary: 3 circles arranged as a triangle photo attatched
